Here are the SailboatData.com specs.

title: Where is Tohubohu?
text: When AIS is running AND we are within eyeshot of the boat (without pirates…argh!), you can see where we are on the map below. If you don’t see us, we are either working on the boat (on the hard), AIS is off, boat is sold, or we fell off the flat earth (just kidding). If you are really curious, you can check out our AIS transponder or on VesselFinder.com.

title: Boat History (with Us)
text:
flowchart TB
    X{Get Boat?\n March 2020} -->|Simone: YES| FIND
    
    subgraph FIND[COVID]
      direction TB
      B[Boat Shopping] --> F1[Perseverate on Jeanneau]
      F1 --> C[Found Boat:\nBeneteau 473]
    end
    
FIND --> NB

    subgraph NB[New Boat: Tohubohu]
      direction TB
      D[Day Sailing]
      D --> E[Small Projects]
      E --> S[Shakedown Cruise]
    end

NB --> BPI

    subgraph BPI[Boat Problems Begin]
      direction TB
      G[Battery Failure]
      G --> L[LiPO4 Upgrade]
      L --- Z[Lightning Strike]
      Z --> Y[Insurance Claim: GEICO]
      Y --> N[Norton Nightmare]
      N --> T[Tow to Zimmermans]
      T --> SU[Zimmerman Nightmare]
      SU --> U[Insurance Claim 2: GEICO]
      U --> V[Holding Pattern]
    end

BPI --> PN

    subgraph PN[Post Nightmare: TBD]
      direction TB
      W[New Boat?] -->|Simone & Patrick: NO| F[Dodger?]
    end

    click B "http://yachtworld.com" "Yachtworld"

title: Projects
text: These are the projects in varying levels of completion.

title: Preparations
text: The following safety measures were put in place on the boat to ensure a complete circumnavigation. The boat was also prepared for the long journey ahead. The following is a list of the preparations made to the boat and to us.

title: Preparations
text:
Keel
The Beneteau 473 has a solid iron keel with flared bottom that serves as an additional moment arm for this shallow-draft fiberglass boat. Inspections in 2020 and 2023 showed usual
